mdRecord.dcterms:title: Proposed Letter to the Congregation
mdRecord.dcterms:description: April 30, 1965 Proposed letter to the congregation / A draft of a letter to the congregation explaining the Reverend's "participation in interracial affairs" within the community. / Individuals referenced: Robert Taylor, Francis Griffin
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Arthur M. Field, Jr.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States--Race Relations
Civil Rights Movements--United States
